extendedInfo.description: See our jobs on your phone!Work in Denmark is now available in a mobile version for finding jobs.- Search for jobs in free text.- Search for jobs by category.- View jobs.- Send a link to the job by e-mail.- See contact information.Work in Denmark is the official Danish website for international recruitment.

reviews.title: Not enough.
reviews.comment: Allows searching and viewing jobs only. No possibility to log in or apply through the app.
reviews.author: A Google User
